Since the original version of CogNiac is non-robust and resolves only anaphors that obey certain rules, for fairer and comparable results we implemented the resolve-all version as described in (Baldwin, 1997).

raw_text: Baldwin? s CogniacCogNiac (Baldwin, 1997) is a knowledge poor approach to anaphora resolution based on a set of high confidence rules which are successively applied over the pronoun under consideration
clean_text: Baldwin's CogNiac (Baldwin, 1997) is a knowledge poor approach to anaphora resolution based on a set of high confidence rules which are successively applied over the pronoun under consideration.
